entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is proud of his magical creatures. He points to the cow carcass on the ground.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is trying to understand the mystery of the horses. Hagrid nods at him in approval.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another student at Hogwarts who is also able to see the invisible creatures.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is skeptical and asks what they are supposed to be seeing.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student at Hogwarts who gasps in terror when she sees the invisible creatures stripping flesh from bones.

entities.name: cow carcass
entities.description: The cow carcass on the ground is what Hagrid points to for everyone to see.

relationships.description: Hagrid points at the cow carcass on the ground.
Hagrid nods at Harry in approval.
Parvati gasps and squeals when she sees the invisible creatures stripping flesh from bones.
